alert.note: Alert for Boone; Cabell; Calhoun; Jackson; Kanawha; Lincoln; Putnam; Roane; Wayne (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 9:01AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...SGusty showers will impact portions of southeastern Calhoun, southeastern Cabell, Putnam, northern Kanawha, Lincoln, southern Roane, southeastern Jackson, central Wayne and northwestern Boone Counties through 945 AM EST... At 900 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from 7 miles east of Buffalo to near Fort Gay. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Charleston, Nitro, Winfield, Hamlin, Jefferson, South Charleston, St. Albans, Dunbar, Hurricane, Sissonville, Milton, Eleanor, Clendenin, Poca, Ranger, Pinch, Cross Lanes, Gill, East Lynn Lake and Kenna. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 between mile markers 1 and 28. Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 96 and 127. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 27 and 57. Route 119 between mile markers 54 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Boone; Cabell; Calhoun; Jackson; Kanawha; Lincoln; Putnam; Roane; Wayne
